resources.string: Spendid is an expense tracking application that allows users to create records of the transactions that they have made, and store them in virtual wallets, to allow for ease of tracking of their expenses.
If you enjoy using Spendid, consider following us, the developers, on social media.
Spendid uses a currency exchange rate API created by Fawaz Ahmed, and is NOT affiliated, endorsed or supported by Fawaz Ahmed.
